body_html:
I am using the API named 'tf.estimator.train_and_evaluate' for distributed training, but i can't see any evaluation results (like accuracy, AUC) in the worker's LOG.

After reading this pull request Q&A, maybe there are two way to print evaluation results:

  1. I have tried Jeff's Exporter, but there's also no logs of export_path or eval_results, i'm confusing for where to get the results. Can you help me? the paper i referenced is https://jeff.is/blog/exporting-eval-results-in-tensorflow.html @jeffcarp

  2. How can i print the event files used by TensorBoard (as a protobuf, not as JSON, but otherwise the same) in the worker's log? is there any demo for me? Thank you very much! @martinwicke

body:
I am using the API named 'tf.estimator.train_and_evaluate' for distributed training, but i can't see any evaluation results (like accuracy, AUC) in the worker's LOG.

After reading this pull request Q&A, maybe there are two way to print evaluation results:
1. I have tried Jeff's Exporter, but there's also no logs of export_path or eval_results, i'm confusing for where to get the results. Can you help me? the paper i referenced is https://jeff.is/blog/exporting-eval-results-in-tensorflow.html  @jeffcarp 

2. How can i print the event files used by TensorBoard (as a protobuf, not as JSON, but otherwise the same) in the worker's log? is there any demo for me? Thank you very much! @martinwicke
